::Ramulus!::

As the afterefects of the earthquake caused by two explosions reaches the 
Ark's power crystals, it creates extra friction, giving more energy to the 
entire ship. Across the ship, lights glare brighter for a few seconds. The 
controlls beep, reporting the power levels jumping toward 120%.

In the CR room, an electric shock passes through the dead body of Ramulus, 
which was left in a CR chamber, and due to that was now fully repaired.

Above the planet, a spark falters on it's jeorney to the matrix. A strange 
power pulling it back, the spark heads toward earth, and eventually into the 
Ark.

Ramulus opens his eyes, his internal computer reporting that he was fully 
functional. He stands up, exiting the CR chamber. Ramulus blinks several 
times.

"I'm .... alive," he says in surprise, questions drifting through his mind. 
What had happened? He growls as he remembers the battle against the predacons 
in which he had been killed. Why was he alive now?

Ramulus takes a few steps and smiles. By whatever means he had been 
ressurected, he was alive, that was good enough for him!

"Liono," he says into his comm-link, "Ramulus here. Reporting for duty."

Ramulus walks off toward the bridge.
